title: Kuttram Purindhavan
overview: In a small-town, when a girl goes missing, Retiree Baskaran takes extreme measures to protect his grandson, Esther is consumed by guilt, and powerless constable Gautham races to find the truth. Secrets surface, leading to an uneasy alliance between Baskaran and Gautham, to a final showdown, justice is served, but guilt leaves some with closure and others haunted.
